about_the_game:
Embark on an Enigmatic Journey

Step into the shoes of the "Fix Fixer," an Action RPG Roguelike game, where you are the chosen one of Hephaestus, the Greek God of Smithing. With a diverse array of planes echoing with myth and magic, the game takes you on a journey filled with wonder, danger, and the resonant clang of a trusty hammer.

Feel the Thrill of Destruction

Arm yourself with a hammer of epic proportions and watch as the world bends to your will. Each swing could mean creation or destruction - the choice is yours. But remember, even as you revel in your power, there are things even the Fixer holds too dear for destruction.

Unravel Untold Mysteries

Each plane whispers its own secrets. Dive into the stories embedded within your tasks, exploring the depths of a world where every fixing request is a riddle, every mission an unfolding tale. Will you uncover the truth concealed in your duties?

Master Mystical Forces

Harness the magic within and wrest it from the clutches of your foes. Battle enemies, mini-bosses, and bosses on each plane to acquire their magical abilities, drawing upon these new-found powers to progress through your journey.

Experience the Flux of Space-Time

Every visit to a mission unfolds a new aspect of the story, courtesy of our dynamic procedural generation. Each level, each encounter, is a fresh stroke on the ever-changing canvas of your adventure.

"Fix Fixer" blends the comfort of the homely kitchen sink with the allure of Greek myths and far-flung planes. An enticing mix of action, mystery, and hammer-swinging heroism awaits you. Add it to your wishlist today and let the adventure unravel!

name: Fix Fixer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Higher
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Higher
  • Processor: 4 Core CPU or Higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1060
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Fix Fixer is Action RPG with Roguelike elements which you play through Hephaestus' procedurally generated universes as an one and only handyman of him, Fix Fixer!
supported_languages:
English*, Turkish, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
